userNeeds.title: Search for available properties
userNeeds.description: Prospective renters need to search and filter available properties by location, price range, number of bedrooms, and amenities

userNeeds.title: Submit rental application online
userNeeds.description: Prospective renters need to submit their rental application with personal details, employment information, and references digitally

userNeeds.title: Schedule property viewings
userNeeds.description: Prospective renters need to request and schedule viewing appointments for properties they're interested in

userNeeds.title: Make online rental payments
userNeeds.description: Renters need to pay monthly rent, deposit, and other fees securely through the platform

userNeeds.title: Submit maintenance requests
userNeeds.description: Tenants need to report maintenance issues, upload photos, and track the status of their requests

userNeeds.title: Create property listings
userNeeds.description: Landlords need to create detailed property listings with photos, descriptions, pricing, and availability

userNeeds.title: Review rental applications
userNeeds.description: Landlords need to view and assess rental applications, including tenant profiles and reference checks

userNeeds.title: Generate lease agreements
userNeeds.description: Landlords need to create, customize, and send lease agreements to approved tenants for digital signing

userNeeds.title: Track rental income
userNeeds.description: Landlords need to monitor rental payments, view payment history, and receive notifications for late payments

userNeeds.title: Conduct move-out inspections
userNeeds.description: Landlords need to document property condition during move-out, compare with move-in report, and process deposit returns

userNeeds.title: Manage multiple properties
userNeeds.description: Property managers need a dashboard to oversee multiple properties, track occupancy rates, and manage listings

userNeeds.title: Coordinate viewing schedules
userNeeds.description: Property managers need to approve viewing requests, manage calendars, and coordinate with prospective tenants

userNeeds.title: Oversee maintenance operations
userNeeds.description: Property managers need to review maintenance requests, assign tasks to maintenance staff, and track completion

userNeeds.title: Perform reference checks
userNeeds.description: Property managers need to conduct background and reference checks on applicants and document findings

userNeeds.title: Monitor platform activity
userNeeds.description: Admins need to view analytics on user registrations, property listings, applications, and transactions

userNeeds.title: Manage user accounts
userNeeds.description: Admins need to create, suspend, or delete user accounts for landlords, tenants, and property managers

userNeeds.title: Handle payment disputes
userNeeds.description: Admins need to review and resolve payment disputes between landlords and tenants

userNeeds.title: Configure system settings
userNeeds.description: Admins need to manage platform configuration, fees, service charges, and payment gateway settings

userNeeds.title: Review suspicious activities
userNeeds.description: Security officers need to monitor and investigate potentially fraudulent listings, applications, or payment activities

userNeeds.title: Verify identity documents
userNeeds.description: Security officers need to validate identity documents submitted by landlords and tenants during registration

userNeeds.title: Manage access controls
userNeeds.description: Security officers need to configure user permissions and access levels across the platform

userNeeds.title: Receive maintenance assignments
userNeeds.description: Maintenance staff need to receive notifications of assigned maintenance requests with property details and issue descriptions

userNeeds.title: Update task status
userNeeds.description: Maintenance staff need to update the status of maintenance tasks and upload photos of completed work

userNeeds.title: Access property information
userNeeds.description: Maintenance staff need to view property access details, contact information, and any special instructions
